person.description: Isa has been in love with design since she can remember. She‘s fascinated with its facets and permanent changes. She took her first steps in the industry as a digital media designer, photo assistant and advertising engineer. At the moment she‘s forming her knowledge by studying design at the Köln International School of Design. In her free time she follows her passion for design, illustration and photography. You‘ll rarely meet her without her two best friends: her bike and of course her camera.
person.meta_description: Isa is not a Ruby on Rails developer
